Replace.Text: +2 [ICON_Science] Technology, +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture, +2 [ICON_Faith] Faith, one Great Work slot of any type, 7 Loyalty points per turn for the city
Royal Palace district's adjacent gold bonus also provides a productivity bonus, +1 trade route. +1 Governor title

+10% [ICON_Science], +10% [ICON_Culture], +10% [ICON_Faith], +30% [ICON_Gold] for cities on the same continent as [ICON_Capital] (including [ICON_Capital]). +5% [ICON_PressureUp], +5% [ICON_Food], +25% [ICON_Production] for cities on a different continent than [ICON_Capital].

Royal Navy specialty district. One can be built per city and does not take up districts. Provides standard adjacency bonuses for all district types, +2 [ICON_Gold] gold for each adjacent district, +3 [ICON_Gold] gold for each adjacent Royal Castle, and +4 [ICON_Gold] gold for each adjacent city center. +2 [ICON_Amenities] Amenities, +10% for all outputs of the city.

Royal Navy unique improvement, can only be built in river cells. +1 [ICON_Housing] Housing, +3 [ICON_Gold] Gold, +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture, +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith, +1 [ICON_Tourism] Tourism. +1 [ICON_Food] Food for each adjacent camp, farm, or ranch, +3 [ICON_Gold] Gold for each adjacent luxury resource, +3 [ICON_Faith] Faith for adjacent natural wonders, +3 [ICON_Culture] Culture for adjacent world wonders, +1 [ICON_Science] Technology for adjacent academies. As municipal technology is unlocked, the output of [ICON_Science] Technology, [ICON_Culture] Culture, and [ICON_Faith] Faith will be further improved.
The Royal Palace's adjacent bonus is doubled. Royal Council Chamber +4 [ICON_Food] Food, +4 [ICON_Production], Royal Castle +1 [ICON_Food] Food, +1 [ICON_Production] Production.

The cost of building a theater square is halved, the Ancient Roman Theater gains +2 [ICON_Faith] Faith points, and +1 [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer point. [ICON_GreatWork_Writing] Literary Works gain +2 [ICON_Science] Science points, +2 [ICON_Faith] Faith points, and the [ICON_Tourism] tourism performance is doubled. The Library gains +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture points, and has an additional [ICON_GreatWork_Writing] Great Work slot.
Elizabeth's unique unit, replaces the Battleship. Stronger than the Battleship, +7 [ICON_Strength] against naval forces.
All combat units gain +25% experience, [ICON_Strength] combat strength +2
